meanings.definition: A picture or design made up of many small photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photomosaic on the wall was created using hundreds of tiny pictures.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful photomosaic of a flower garden at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The photomosaic of a cat made entirely of cat photos was both cute and clever.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a photomosaic, each small moment pieced together to form a beautiful whole.
meanings.sent5: The photomosaic of the city skyline captured every detail in a unique and captivating way.

meanings.definition: To create a picture or design by arranging small photographs.
meanings.sent1: She decided to photomosaic her vacation photos into a stunning collage.
meanings.sent2: The artist used software to photomosaic the images into a breathtaking masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: I tried to photomosaic my family photos, but it ended up looking like a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent4: His words photomosaiced a vivid image of the past in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The photographer skillfully photomosaiced the portraits into a cohesive and artistic composition.
